The Thompsons:
Jack Thompson (18): A high school student (lakewood high), in the second month of his senior year. He has brown hair, brown eyes, and a large build. 6' tall, He isn't fat by any stretch of the imagination, but he isnt too muscular either. He is a smart kid, he just doesnt apply himself, and therefore gets good but not great grades. Overall an average person in almost every other aspect (social life, sports etc.).

Mark Thompson(44): Jack's dad, a semi-wealthy businessman. He provided a middle class lifestyle for his family, and owns his own firm as a financial advisor. Because of this, he often has to work long hours. Looks and acts a lot like Jack, although he is slightly more serious due to his profession. A family man.

Christine Thompson(43): Jack's mom. She is a stay at home mom, since Mark's business does pretty well. She is blonde with blue eyes, and a good figure for her age. She likes to stay in shape, and try to eat healthy (because that's the craze nowadays), but is a pretty relaxed person. For her, family has always come first, and she is always concerned about her kids and husband. She has an average intelligence, and has a bubbly personality, which makes her a good people person, and always tries to be an optimist.

Jenny Thompson(19): Jack's older sister. She has brown hair and brown eyes, and more of her mom's personality and looks. She and Jack often get along, but can fight just as much (as any siblings do). She goes to the nearby college, and will come home and visit on the weekends, or come over for dinner when she has time.
